img.alt: Advanced Tab Panel can have left, right, top and bottom side tabs

p.i: Advanced Tab Panel can have left, right, top and bottom side tabs

div.p:
Advanced TabPanel is a widget that renders a GWT panel with tabs band displaying position on the top, bottom, left or right side of this panel. The main features of the component are:
tabs position cutomization
custom tabs band rendering
custom contant and tab borders rendering
In opposite to other advanced components it doesn't requery display() method invokation and redraws tabs band every time a new tab added or selected.
